item.title: CVE-2024-1769|2024-03-05T01:56:03.244Z -- jmlapam -- JM Twitter Cards
item.description: The JM Twitter Cards plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 12 via the meta description data. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to view password protected post content when viewing the page source.
